channel.title: Specific Gravity: How much water do I add/remove?
channel.description:
Here's an open source specific gravity calculator to tell you how much water to add/remove to get a certain specific gravity in a glaze.
https://jbruce12000.github.io/glaze-specific-gravity-calculator/html/specific-gravity.html

item.title: Specific Gravity: How much water do I add/remove?
item.dc:creator: derek
item.description:
And what’s this??? https://github.com/jbruce12000/kiln-controller Looks awesome!

I announced your project and added you to the Open-Source group (sorry it’s on Facebook, no other way to get people involved). I hope you’ll chime in and introduce people to your other projects like the kiln controller.

Read full topic
item.source: Specific Gravity: How much water do I add/remove?
